title: Yorktown
provenance_text:
Thomas Doyle [b. 1928], New York, NY; Allan Stone Gallery, New York, NY [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was included (no. 97, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Allan Stone Gallery.
[2]. The sculpture was a gift from Allan Stone Gallery. It was accessioned on November 29, 1961.

creator.birth_place: Jerry City (Wood County, Ohio, United States)
